front.title: Transparent Discovery of STIR Out-of-Band Call Placement Services

abstract.t: This document defines a Discovery Service for STIR Out-of-Band (OOB) Call Placement Services (CPS). The Discovery Service enables Authentication Services (AS) and Verification Services (VS) to quickly determine which CPS is responsible for a given telephone number (TN) or Service Provider Code (SPC), allowing retrieval of PASSporTs even when SIP Identity headers are removed by non-IP or hybrid network segments. The Discovery Service leverages a CPS URI certificate extension, which allows STIR Certificates or Delegate Certificates to embed an HTTPS URI for the CPS serving the TNs or SPCs covered by the certificate.
